name: Clide (yoave)
description:
The Quit button should not be used on browsers :)
Play in full screen the best experience.

Welcome to Clide!

In this game your goal is to run away from the Shmubler for as long as possible (it's harder then you think), while his little minions the Gooblers will try to stop you.

## Controls

 -  Walk with WASD or arrow keys (although you only want to move forward)
 - Jump with Space
 -  Slash in mid air by pressing Space
 - Slide using SHIFT.

Slash and Slide on the Gooblers to defeat them and destory their walls.

This game was made for the ScoreSpace Jam#23 - https://itch.io/jam/scorejam23

## Leaderboard

 - Put you name and press enter at the start to be placed in the leaderboard!

* The high score reset when reentering the game

Hope you enjoy it, please leave feedback :)
